name: WARACHIKUY
description:
Warachikuy is an end of the year game project done by 3D animation students 2019-2020 from ITECOM Art Design school in Nice (France).

This game has been created with UNREAL Engine.
Students created the 3D models with Maya and integrated them into Unreal.

Students:
Roxane DALONIS, Vincent FELIX, Thibault MANGIAPAN, Maureen MARTIN

For more information and contact :   https://www.lucbianco.com/jeux-unreal-etudiants-itecom-2020/
